rules.description: Cmd+1 [Open first pinned Dock app (Finder); +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+2 [Open second pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+3 [Open third pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+4 [Open fourth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+5 [Open fifth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+6 [Open sixth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+7 [Open seventh pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+8 [Open eighth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Cmd+9 [Open ninth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
CapsLock to Hyper (Cmd+Option+Cntl) or Escape (If Alone)
